name: Catherine
content:
files:
- mfplat_dll: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dll/mfplat/x32/mfplat.dll
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 893180
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: mf vcrun2017
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X86.exe
    component: mediafoundation
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X86.exe
    component: mf_
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X86.exe
    component: mfreadwrite
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X86.exe
    component: wmadmod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X86.exe
    component: wmvdecod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: mfplat_dll
- task:
    app: xact win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
